name: Moonshot Dunk Tank
description:
A game based on The Podcast Mines podcast from the Moonshot Podcast Network. Dunk water on hosts Riley and Andrew!

Move with mouse.
Left-click to flip the bucket and drop water.

Dump water on Riley and Andrew while avoiding any expensive equipment.

Stack multipliers to boost your score!

Twitter:
